game.name: UBERMOSH:SANTICIDE
game.categories: Single-player, Steam Achievements, Full controller support, Family Sharing
game.shortDescription: SANTICIDE is the sixth volume of the arcade series UBERMOSH. A must buy for arcade and top-down enthusiasts.
game.shortDescriptionEn: SANTICIDE is the sixth volume of the arcade series UBERMOSH. A must buy for arcade and top-down enthusiasts.

reviewHighlights.text: A darker entry featuring aggressive enemies, responsive controls, and a soundtrack that supports the action well.
